name: Hellevator (Hellafun)
description:
Hellevator is a top down action game where you are playing as Jesus Christ where your friend Greg was dragged to hell in a controversial ruling by Satan. You decide to gear up, enter the elevator to hell and go save Greg. On your way down you will slay demons, buy upgrades and attempt to free Greg.

"Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to bring peace, but a sword"   
-Jesus Christ

Credits:

Huginn Sær Grímsson
Jón Kristinn þórðarson
Kristinn Örn Kristinsson 
Óðinn Hjaltason Schiöth
